item.title: Vim Macro 101
item.author: MartinLwx
item.description: Intro In the process of learning Vim, the most enlightening sentence for me is : Vim is a kind of programming language I once tried to learn Vim a long time ago. However, the keystroke combinations are very difficult to memorize in my opinion. So I later gave up learning Vim and switched to a normal text editor. My view of Vim changed when I took this course: Missing semester. I started to regard Vim as a kind of programming language rather than just a text editor.
